title: What could have become of Amy Winehouse if she hadn't been drugs-sick? - Quora

response.answer_text: Slow down there, Sherlock. Amy was BiPolar first. I am Bipolar and I was an alcohol addict too. She used drugs and alcohol to self medicate. Imagine a disorder, untreated where you feel like you had 10 cups of coffee? You drink and or do drugs. But she along with Kurt Cobain and others knew Lithium (like the song) zaps your creativity. Both of them refused treatment because they new Bipolar drugs would hurt their careers. If Amy were still alive I bet she would have had a few more good to great albums left in her. Or maybe not. Brian Wilson the leader of the Beach Boys never did anything worthwhile since he was on medication. And thems the facts Jax.
